name: Firelust
description:
Firelust is a 2D top-down action game, that focuses on player's skill and fast gameplay. Under the seemingly story-less game there's a disturbing story that might just keep you up at night
All of the over 20 action-packed, spectacular levels can be played in both single player and co-op modes. The player has to come up with a unique strategy to pass each and every level. The great in-game music created by indie artists will enrich your gameplay.

All xbox-like controllers are supported. You can hook up as many of them as you want.
